headline: Publicis Deepens Influencer Marketing Push With Deal for Captiv8
summary: Publicis  Groupe said it is buying Captiv8, a platform that connects influencers and brands, in a deal that steps up its push into influencer-marketing services.  Paris-based Publicis is seeking to tap in to growing demand for influencer-marketing services.  Brands are increasingly turning to influencers and content creators to promote products and services on social media, as consumers shift away from traditional media.

headline: Omnicom: Deteriorating Forecasts
summary: Omnicom faces significant uncertainty from the IPG acquisition and industry disruption, with no clear catalyst for a turnaround in sight. See why OMC stock is a Hold.
